title: BHEL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 160 Apprentice Posts
description: The Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 160 Graduate Apprentices, Diploma Apprentices, and Trade Apprentices. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma, 10th, ITI can apply for the BHEL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the edu...
